column5: Hi guys,  I have an odd request, does anyone know where I could purchase anywhere from 100-150 either Spinner baits or Spoons with either an Engraving or painted short script on them each?  I dont need them until August of 2010 but would like to order them soon. I dont need packaging, just the lures are they are gifts.  If anyone can help it would be greatly appreciated.  Thanks,  Mike

Lucky Strike bait works in Peterborough does do special orders on spoons etc. for weddings they are located on Sir Sandford Fleming Parkway. phone 743-3849 (705) also seen Ducks Unlimited on the spoons and other groups and companys.
Great Thanks. Does anyone know if Eppinger will entertain these types of requests?
Try Northamfishing.com.  Franks's an OFC member and the owner and may be able to put together a custom order.  good luck
I think Len Thompson does that.
Yes Check out Northamfishing they are awesome ppl to deal with and quality lures
Lures as gifts wow.  I wouldn't be able to do it.

Great, whats Frank's screenname on here?  Roy, thanks for the idea with Len Thompson. Looked at the page, and looks exactly like what I am looking for. I will send them an email.  Also, I am out in Ottawa now, so if you are ever in need of a tag along, let me know.  Thanks again guys,  Mike
